Visualize Your Events: Google Calendar Image Assistant

Ever wished you could see your plans, literally? Introducing the perfect companion for your Google Calendar: our Image Assistant extension!

Key Features:

Image Integration: Seamlessly add images to any event in your calendar. Whether it's a photo of the venue, the gear you need, or any relevant visual cue.  Once the event is saved, when you click on the event the image will appear in the tabbed area behind the event name.  

Situational Awareness: By adding an image, it's not just a textual event anymore. See the soccer field you'll play on, the conference room for your meeting, or the materials for your craft session. It's about more than memory; it's about visualization.

Mental Rehearsal: Especially beneficial for individuals with executive challenges, this tool assists in preparing mentally by offering a visual representation of what's to come.

Why Install?

Forgetting your yoga mat? Upload an image of it next to your yoga class event. Unfamiliar with the meeting venue? Add a photo of the building. It's all about enhancing your situational awareness, allowing for mental preparation and reducing day-to-day stress.

Join other users who are giving a visual dimension to their plans. Enhance your Google Calendar experience, one image at a time.
